body:
Comment 7: 
Raspberry Pi uses ARM1176JZF-S, which does include VFPv2, so you don't
need to use GOARM=5, which uses soft float and the performance would suffer.

You can apply the patch in CL 5987063 (http://golang.org/cl/5987063/),
and build without setting GOARM.
(Unfortunately, that CL is not going to be merged)
